data.name: The Cult of Chanseville
data.detailed_description:
*IMPORTANT NOTE*

The upcoming playable concept demo, releasing on December 23rd, does not represent the final product. The game is in early stages of development. You may encounter some bugs and missing mechanics. Also we are always listening to player feedback, working to create the best experience possible!


About the Game

The Cult of Chanseville is a twisted adventure into the deepest, darkest secrets that haunt the city.

Synopsis :

An evil cult is trying to perform an ancient ritual in the city of Chanseville! Darkness has begun to envelop the city as terrible things happen within it.

You play as a detective who arrives in Chanseville searching for answers surrounding the murder of his wife. Why isn't the law seeking justice for her?

We'll have to survive this terrifying adventure and its many twists and turns to find out!


Features :

In this walking simulator, you'll be treated to a survival horror experience inspired by the most-played classic horror games! Don't let the term "walking simulator" fool you, though - you'll still need to defend yourself from some of your enemies!



[The Cult Of Chanseville] uses the Unreal® Engine. Unreal® is a trademark or registered trademark of Epic Games, Inc. in the United States of America and elsewhere.

data.short_description: "The Cult of Chanseville" is an indie suspense/horror game that's inspired by classics of the genre! The game will be released as soon as it's ready!
data.supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows 7, 10
  • Processor: AMD FX Six Core 6300 3.50 Ghz
  • Graphics: requires graphics card. minimum GPU needed: "AMD Radeon r7 200 series" or similar
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: intel i5 7400 or higher
  • Graphics: nvidia gtx 1050 ti, 1060 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 25 GB available space

data.legal_notice: [The Cult Of Chanseville] uses the Unreal® Engine. Unreal® is a trademark or registered trademark of Epic Games, Inc. in the United States of America and elsewhere.
